metadata.name: Adds or updates a list of App Configuration keys
metadata.description: Adds or updates a list of App Configuration keys
The app configuration instance where the keys will be stored
Array of key/values to be written to the app configuration store, each with the structure {name: "<key-name>", value: "<key-value>"}
When defined, all app configuration keys will have this label applied

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', parameters('appConfigStoreName'), if(empty(parameters('label')), parameters('entries')[copyIndex()].name, format('{0}${1}', parameters('entries')[copyIndex()].name, parameters('label'))))]
